alert.note: Alert for Redwood (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:18PM CDT until July 22 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN REDWOOD COUNTY... At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Tracy, or 15 miles southeast of Marshall, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Walnut Grove and Revere. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
